title: Web Interface - Admin Panel & Seeder
description:
Phase 5: Build admin panel for user/plan management, create database seeder.

Files to create:
- app/api/admin.py - Admin endpoints
- app/templates/admin/dashboard.html
- app/templates/admin/users.html
- app/templates/admin/plans.html
- app/services/seeder.py - Seed data

Seeds:
- Admin: admin@judolhunter.com / Admin@123
- Test: test@judolhunter.com / Test@123
- Plans: free, lite (Rp 50K/bln), pro (Rp 150K/bln), corporate (Rp 500K/bln)

title: Web Interface - Terminal UI
description:
Phase 4: Create terminal-style UI with HTMX + Alpine.js.

Files to create:
- app/static/css/terminal.css - Terminal visual styles
- app/templates/base.html - Base template
- app/templates/index.html - Landing page
- app/templates/scan/new.html - Scan form
- app/templates/scan/results.html - Results display
- app/templates/scan/history.html - Scan history
- app/static/js/app.js - Alpine.js components with SSE

UI: Green terminal aesthetic, Fira Code font, real-time output streaming

title: Web Interface - Foundation & Database
description:
Phase 1: Create core configuration, database models (User, Plan, Scan, UsageTracker), and initial Alembic migration.

Files to create:
- app/config.py - Settings with DATABASE_URL env var
- app/utils/db.py - Async SQLAlchemy session
- app/models/user.py - User, Plan models
- app/models/scan.py - Scan, UsageTracker models
- alembic/versions/001_initial.py - Initial migration
- .env.example - Environment template

Tech: FastAPI, SQLAlchemy 2.0 Async, Alembic

title: Web Interface - Scanner Service & Quota
description:
Phase 3: Refactor scan_url() from googlebot.py to async service, implement quota validation, SSE streaming.

Files to create:
- app/services/scanner.py - Refactored scan logic
- app/schemas/scan.py - Scan DTOs
- app/services/quota_service.py - Quota validation
- app/api/scans.py - Scan endpoints with SSE

Endpoints: POST /api/scans, GET /api/scans, GET /api/scans/{id}, GET /api/scans/{id}/stream

title: Web Interface - Authentication System
description:
Phase 2: Implement JWT authentication, user registration/login.

Files to create:
- app/core/security.py - JWT, password hashing
- app/schemas/user.py - User DTOs
- app/api/auth.py - Auth endpoints
- app/templates/auth/login.html
- app/templates/auth/register.html

Endpoints: POST /api/auth/register, POST /api/auth/login, GET /api/auth/me
